"In you go, my sweet treat." Delia takes the first bite. Then another. Misty is inches away from her mouth. Delia sticks the pizza in her mouth and bites it, making Misty trapped in her mouth. She chews it up and swallows. "You're next." She said, looking at Ash. Then . . .

Of course, Ash couldn't do anything as Delia then dropped him in some wine while untying Ash from the dental floss. Ash then regains his sight and begs his mom to let him go. Delia complies and Ash is relieved, when all of a sudden, Delia puts Ash in a cup of water! "MOM! please Let Me Out" whimpers Ash. "Well Ashy, since today marks the end of your journey, I'll keep you on display until I die!" explained Delia, much to Ash's horror. 1342212.content:
They both sat in the cage, holding each other close. Misty kisses Ash on the cheek. He turns towards her and kisses her back. They lay down next to each other waiting for Delia to get back.
"I wonder how she will eat us." Misty said. Ash nodded and put his arms around her.
"At least we will be together." He said. After about ten minutes, Delia finally came back and grabbed both of them. She took them to the kitchen. They saw a bowl of macaroni and cheese. Ash was dropped into it, while Misty was placed in a cage that had an excellent view of Delia eating Ash.
"YUM YUM, HERE I COME COME" Delia said loudly. Ash fled as Delia teased him. She almost kept getting him on her fork. She just giggled. Finally, Delia put her fork down and licked her lips.
What's she doing now?Misty wondered. Delia tipped her head and grabbed Ash with her mouth, pulling him up so Misty could see. Delia swallowed and licked her lips. "Now, my dessert." Delia said looking at Misty. She grabbed her and went into the living room. On a table, there was a chocolate sundae.
"No! Please!" Misty yelled, as she was lowered in the sundae.
"Quit complaining, you shall be with your lover, and I shall have my dessert, so we both win." Delia dropped Misty in. She then used a straw to drink it. Misty was almost sucked up in the straw. When it was almost gone, Delia threw away her straw. "Almost done, and then you can be with Ash, if he's still alive." Delia raised the Sundae up to her lips and drank the rest, along with Misty. She was tossed around her mouth and traveled to her stomach. Ash was there, almost unconscious.
"Oh Ash." Misty said, and hugged him. Delia rubbed her belly.
"So tasty."

choices: She will help, and brings Ash to his friends.
She won't, and keeps the tiny trainer for herself.
135331212221.content:
While wondering how did he got in such predicament, Ash suddenly hears a sound. A sweet sound. It almost seems like... a song.
'Wait, where did I hear this song before?' the small trainer asks to himself, listening to the very familiar sound. It doesn't take long for him to remember.
'Wait a minute! I know this song! She must be around here!' Ash thinks, before starting following the sound, searching for its source.

It takes a while (mostly because of his reduced size), but eventually Ash makes it to a bush, where the sound is at its loudest.

Peeking in between the leaves of the bush, Ash... Nothing. Even though the sound is obviously coming from here, this bush is empty apart from the one inch tall trainer.

But then, the song suddenly stops. A figure appears out of nowhere. It has long, green hair, a blue gem on its face, bright blue eyes. A black 'dress' covers its body, leaving out two white, slim legs. Ash smiles. As he guessed, it was Meloetta the cause of the sound.

Apparently having felt the small trainer thanks to her psychic abilities, Meloetta looks around to spot the presence she felt. But... no pokemon nor human is in this bush, just herself.

Then, a faint voice, almost like a squeak, calls out to her.
"Hey Meloetta, it's me, Ash! Down here!" the voice calls.

Looking down, Meloetta spots her friend, the same one that saved her from those three crazy humans and the talking Meowth. But... Something's different about him... Last time she saw him, he was taller than her... Now she could easily crush him in her fingers.

Picking up the shrunken trainer, Meloetta nuzzles him, glad to have met him again. Ash laughs.
"Yeah Meloetta... I'm happy to be seeing you again too..." he says while being nuzzled.

It takes a bit to explain the situation to the giant pokemon, bur eventually Ash does, ending his story with a question.
"So Meloetta, will you help me grow back?" he asks. The Melody pokemon looks at her little friend, taking in his words, before smiling warmly...
135331212221.title: Encounter with an old friend.

1412.title: James and/or Meowth found Ash

14121.content:
Ash shuffled through the tall grass, which to anyone else would be considered a normal height for grass of about a couple inches. Through the blades, he found a periwinkle headed man with slightly tanned skin and emerald green eyes. It was James.
Despite James had been Ash's nemesis since he ventured through the Kanto region for him, Jessie, and Meowth persistently trying to steal pikachu, the boy was growing desperate. He's been this size for hours, but it felt like days for him and feels like he could ask for help from anyone.
Should he?
14121.title: James found Ash

choices: No, I'm starting to get second thoughts!
141211.content:
Ash has known James for so long, he even sees him more than his own mother nowadays. Despite the relationship the two hold, the trainer knew that James was the kindest member in the trio and wouldn't hurt him. After all, he's never tried to do so before.
James scavenged through some bushes for some berries after some pesky skwovets and a fat greedent stolen his dinner, but it seemed to him that they had taken all the berries too.
"Those varmints have no decency, I couldn't even catch any to show to the boss." the agent sighed, feeling his stomach grumble from hunger and rubbing it as if to soothe it.
Ash marched through the green surroundings until he was met with the agent's foot. He jumped up and pulled on James' white pant leg in order to get his attention.
"Hey, James! Can you hear me!?" the boy shouted as a second measure to make sure he can be heard.
James' head shot up hearing Ash's voice, darting his eyes around the area to see where he was, almost returning to work until he looked at the ground. Before him was Ash, but the young trainer had shrunken to a mere inch and was even shorter than the grass. The agent stared wide eyed at the tiny Ash before his face softened.
"What happened to you?" he asked in a concerned manner, bending down to get a better look at the young trainer. But he still couldn't get a good look at him due to his height, so he held out a hand to Ash as if to invite him to jump on.
Should he trust him?
141211.title: Ask for help

choices: Yes, I bet it's lovely inside James' stomach!
1412111.content:
Ash hopped up onto James' gloved hand, the team rocket member inspected the tiny trainer with his giant emerald eyes. He looked down at the black fabric of the glove and to his white sleeve, before looking up at the lavender haired man.
"I-I don't know, I just opened my pokédex and it shrunk me." he admitted. "I can't believe I'm saying this to a Team Rocket member, but...I need your help. I don't know where anyone else I know is at."
Hm. Helping a twerp, that's something James has never done before. Well, at least on this level. Other times where the two teamed up had almost never required this much trust. Besides that, he didn't even know where to start. What if he did something wrong? But he didn't have much choice.
"Well..." he glanced to the bottom left corner of his eye before shifting them to the helpless trainer. "...okay, I'll help you." he sighed.
Ash grinned in relief. "Thanks, James. Maybe you're not such as bad guy after all!"
"Don't push it, twerp.." James responded. A few seconds after, his stomach rumbled. His face turned red for a second as he glanced down at it. He was a lot hungrier than he thought, the agent even got a few hunger pangs from it. That was when he looked back at the twerp when he got a twisted idea to ease his hunger as a thought crossed his mind:
"I wonder how good he'll taste.."
He knows he shouldn't even think about it, but he was starving, dammit!
"I'm sorry about this, I promise I won't hurt you. Even if you are an enemy, you're still a child." The agent licked his lips at Ash. Said trainer gave him a look before James' mouth opened, warm and minty breath washed over him as he was drawn nearer towards the cave.
Does he want to go along with this?
1412111.title: Yes, he wouldn't hurt me

choices: Nothing. It's not like there's much he can do at this size, anyway
14121112.content:
"JAMES! What are you doing!?"
He was easily scooped up by the wet, squishy tongue. Ash tried to stand back up, but he fell with a grunt. He turned around to the entrance of the maw, only for the light that illuminated it to disappear as James shut his mouth.
The only way to go was down.
Ash felt himself start to slide down his throat, he gripped onto a fang to prevent himself from falling any deeper. That only worked for a second before he lost grip and slid down his slick tounge and entered the esophagus feet first.
James tipped his head back when he felt the feet touch his throat and swallowed, placing two fingers on his neck and felt Ash travel down his snug throat.
Only a few seconds later, the boy landed into James' stomach. He felt the fleshy and smooth wall next to him as he tried to collect his senses. All around him were pink fleshy walls and the sound of soft gurgling echoing around him along with the sound of a heartbeat and breathing. It could be considered soothing in a weird way.
"I'm sorry about that, again. I was just so hungry..."
What should he do next?
14121112.title: Don't eat me!

choices: Yes, today was exhausting! Finally, I can get some rest
141211122.content:
Ash looked up to where he came from, where he could hear James' voice from up there. He sat up and leaned forward.
"You're really not gonna hurt me?" the trainer asked, his voice tense as he gathered what strength he had to prepare for an answer.
"Of course I wouldn't. Catching your pikachu be a lot easier if I digested you, but it's not worth it. Everyone needs a nemesis, after all."
"When are you going to let me out?"
"Depends on whenever there's other food available, which won't be for awhile. Or if you have to go to the bathroom, I don't want you to do your business in there!"
"I have to go to the bathroom!"
"Nice try, twerp."
Ash huffed out a laugh before nestling into a stomach wall. He might have to be here a while, so he'd might as well get comfortable in the fleshy chamber. In fact, Ash is getting a bit too comfortable.
Will he fall asleep?
141211122.title: Nothing. It's not like there's much he ...

"Who are you?" Ash looks up to see Officer Jenny. Ash tries to explain, but she cuts him off. "This is a restricted area, violators are shrunk and arrested." Officer Jenny takes him to . . .
143.title: officer jenny

choices: she was going to keep him for herself!
she was going to a reunion of ALL the Jennys and Ash was going to be their pet!
Ash was going to be used as a playmate for her pokemon
1431.content:
Ash sighed as he was carried off by the officer, wondering WHICH one this Jenny was, seeing as every one of the beautiful, all-female police family were all police officers, all of them looked identical, plus were all named "Jenny" (he wasn't Brock, so he couldn't tell them apart), as she went to her police motorcycle and took out a shoe box and dropped him into it and shut the lid. A second later, he heard the bike's motor start.

After a few hours in the dark box, the bake stopped and the motor was shut off before the box Ash was in was picked up and carried somewhere.

Feeling his box be set down, Ash was blinded by sudden light as the lid was removed, before he was suddenly cast in a massive shadow, which actually helped his eyes adjust, before Ash looked up to see the massive face of Officer Jenny looking at him.

She sighed and then plucked him out from the box and set him down.

Ash looked around. This wasn't a police station, instead, it was a coffie table in someone's living room...and the framed pictures of a bunch of identical ladies and the hung up police academy graduation credentials made whose it was obvious!

He was in Jenny's house! He gulped. Wondering WHY she'd taken him here of all places, then looked up at the giantess of the law.

"Can I at least explain myself?" he asked, as much to distract himself from why he had been taken here as to tell his side of things.

She nodded.

"Look, Officer Jenny...I'm sorry I was there, but I didn't know it was somewhere I wasn't allowed to be."

"Ignorance of the laws is no excuse for breaking it." Jenny said firmly.

"Yeah, but how easy is it to break laws you don't know about? If it was a restricted area, why wasn't there at least a sign to warn about that?" Ash asked.

Jenny frowned. As much as she didn't like it, he had a valid point. The law was made for the sake of keeping people safe, those whom upheld it couldn't be unfair or unreasonable. "True enough...still, the fact remains that I just can't let you go. Besides, even if I informed the ones who set that up about this, the re-enlargement process is a long one to prepare. So you'll have to stay here until then." Jenny told him.

Ash sighed. He should have expected as much. Still...at least she was being reasonable. He was thankful for that. However, the fact that he was on "house arrest" with this Jenny still bothered him.

"So...what happens now?" Ash asked, not looking forward to the answer.

Jenny looked at him, then smirked as she informed Ash that...

1441.content: Which one the little girl or the gym leader?
1441.title: Sabrina

14411.content:
Ash looked up and gawked, horrified, at who was looming over him

A humongous green-haired little girl in a white silk dress and a big white hat with a red bow on her head. And although her eyes were shaded, Ash could sense them staring down at him!

What was worse was that he recognized the girl. She was that doll that was supposed to represent that separate personality of Sabrina. Her childlike emotion incarnate!

"My dolly!" the little girl started to giggle as the skin of the girl's hand took up his vision.

"Hi, dolly. Remember me?" the little girl said.

"No... this can't be. This is impossible! You disappeared!" Ash stampered.

"Yes, it is true that I vanished from your own world, but I was always a part of Sabrina. I simply resided in her mind, waiting for the right time to return once my own psychic strength built up. Once that happened, I separated from her and shrunk you with the psychic powers and teleported you to me!" the little girl said.

"What do you want with me!?" Ash asked.

"It's quite simple. I want to play! You did agree to being my friend the first time Sabrina beat you, and you're SO CUTE this size! I just HAVE to keep you!" the little girl said.

"No way!...I'm not a toy!" Ash cried in alarm.

"Oh, I'm afraid you have no choice in the matter. Let me show you what I mean." the little girl said. She then started stepping towards Ash.

"No! You won't catch me!" Ash took off running in the other direction. The girl simply giggled.

"Heeheehee! There is no escape, Dolly!" the little girl said. Just then, her eyes glowed a bright white, and Ash suddenly collapsed to the ground, screaming in pain.

"Don't worry, Dolly. We'll play together all the time and we'll be friends forever." the little girl said. Ash was able to turn around finally, only to see the skin of that girl's hand taking up his vision.

"No... please don't hurt me! NOOOOOOOOO!!!" Ash shouted before the little girl doll of Sabrina picked him up and hugged him.

"I love my dolly!" Doll-Sabrina pretty much swooned. "What game shall I play first with my brand-new dolly? Maybe we can have tea!"

Ash groaned as he was hugged to the doll's silk dress as she decided on a game to play with him
14411.title: little girl

144111.content:
The little girl giggled again as she felt Ash struggle in her grip “keep it up dolly Ash” she said “a little more of that and you might manage to tickle me!” The little girl giggled as she started to walk.

“Let me go!” Ash demanded again.

“Be quiet little dolly, if you keep whining I’ll just have to strap a diaper on you then we can play a game of house with baby Dolly!” said the little girl with a giggle. Suddenly she stopped moving “here we are!” she said. The little girl lifted her hand which held Ash who found himself looking down at a red picnic blanket, there was a child’s picnic basket, a tiny tea set, and several other dolls (and Ash hopped that’s all they really were). “Look Dolly there’s room for you between Mrs. Princess and Professor Bearington!” said Sabrina as she set Ash down between an average doll dressed in a princess dress and a teddy bear wearing a formal coat with a monocle on his right eye. “There you are dolly” the little girl added as she placed a tea cup in front of Ash. “And now that we are all gathered I would like to welcome you all to my tea party” she told her guests as she took a tea pot out of the basket and began pouring each guest a cup “now everyone wait till everybody has there cup full!” said the little girl momentarily taking her attention away from Ash…
144111.title: Tea party

14433.content: What about his mom - Delia Ketchum?
14433.title: Delia Ketchum

choices: - So I can fit you Up my Ass."
144331.content:
Ash was shocked - he was standing only one inch off the ground. In front of him was his Pokedex; it was gigantic, he dropped it when he started to shrink. He had no idea what happened, but he knew he was in trouble. He had to get out of the park somehow.

He suddenly felt some tremors shake the ground he was walking on. They were so strong and so frequent that he fell off of his feet and onto the ground. Earthquakes this frequent must've meant footsteps; someone was coming this way. He turned around and looked up to see...His mom?! Yes, it was his mom. She was walking casually along the path. He wondered what she was doing here? Although; he had just had a visit with her back in Palette Town, so maybe she came looking for him.

If she was looking for him, then maybe he could get her attention and she would find him. She's his mother; she had to help him. He got up on his feet and began waving his arms. He began to get a little worried when he saw her high heels coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. Delia wasn't even looking down; she was looking about the park, from tree to tree.

However, she suddenly stopped and took a look around. She looked down at the path and saw Ash's Pokedex on the floor. She looked about and suddenly she saw Ash waving his arms. Ash smiled when he noticed that she spotted him. But...then he realized that instead of being shocked that he was so tiny, she was actually smiling.

"Oh, there you are Ash," Delia said reaching down for him. Ash was a bit alarmed as she began to wrap her fingers around him, as well as picking up his Pokedex with her other hand. Ash thought he was going to be sick as she raised him off of the ground. "Oh, I'm so glad you're alright; you could've gotten hurt staying on the path like this."

"Mom!" Ash shouted. "Are you not in the least bit alarmed or even surprised that I'm only an inch tall at present?!"

"Oh of course not, Sweetie," Delia said.

"What?!" Ash shouted, now being shocked himself.

"Well this was inevitable, my little Ashy-Boy," she called him. "These Pokemon Journeys of your keep you away from home for so long...On your last visit home, when Professor Oak updated your Pokedex, I added a new feature of my own." She took the Pokedex and lifted up the panel over the speaker, revealing some kind of broken capsule. "Inside was an inhalant that shrinks whoever breathes it in - and it was activated when you opened your Pokedex. Good thing you did it so close to Palette Town, or I'd never have gotten here in time. Oh my you're so cute." Delia began rubbing his head with one of her fingers, pressing it down and around. "You always were my little baby boy...Now you can be like this forever!"

The sensation was uncomfortable, and Ash was angry. He couldn't believe that his own Mother shrunk him! And not only that, she was planning on keeping him like this forever. He finally pushed his head out from under her finger and shouted up to her again.
"Mom! I cannot believe you did this!" Ash said. "Why did you Shrink me?!?!?!"

Delia stared at him a little bit surprised, like she didn't understand his objection. She slowly smiled and closed her eyes, making a very cheery and nonchalant face. "Why...Isn't it obvious sweetie? -
144331.title: Giantess Mother

Stick him down the back of her panties.
1443312.content:
"WHAT?!" Ash asked, doing a sudden double-take. He honestly couldn't believe what he just heard.

"It's much easier at this size, believe me," Delia said with the same cheery attitude from before.

"You - You - You wanna stick me up your-?" Ash stuttered.

"Yes - isn't it wonderful?" Delia said, still not having opened her eyes to look at him.

Ash couldn't believe it. He refused to think this was real; it could not be happening. This was impossible! How could his mother have shrunken him so that she could shove him up her butt? And more importantly why would she want to do that? Why would his own mother want to do something so vile to her only son?

"Now I know that it will take some getting used to," Delia spoke again. "It will be an adjustment for the both of us."

"MOM!" Ash shouted, at her attitude suggesting he will have to live like that. "Wha-Wha...WHY?! Why would you want to do such a thing?!"

"Well Ash it's simple," she said finally opening her eyes to look at him. "It's something I realized a long time ago; the Pokemon are dangerous wild animals, and you're still just a boy. How long would it be before one of those dangerous monsters tried to kill you? I wanted you to give up being a Pokemon trainer so that you could stay safe. But I also knew that you wouldn't quit on your own...You'd have to be forced to. So I shrunk you so that I could always keep you safe. But with how stubborn and tenacious you are, I know that you could get away from me if I just carried you around in my pocket. So I thought of the one place where I could always keep you close to me and where you'd be safe from the outside world...My ass."

"B-but Mom, that's disgusting," Ash pleaded.

"Oh no sweetie; it's all natural," Delia told him, still with her cheery mood. "You'll absolutely LOVE being tucked away up there." Ash noticed that Delia gave a shake and raised her rump a bit when she said that. Ash was in shock.

"But - But - But," Ash stuttered trying to find words to change her mind.

"No Buts young Man," she said stern and motherly. But then her serious demeanor changed back to a cheery smile and then she giggled slightly. "Except Mine of course." Her giggles became full blown laughter. She cleared her throat and became serious again. "Now - enough of this." Delia suddenly moved her other hand down, and to Ash's horror, she began hiking up her skirt.

"NO - Mom, Please!" he begged.

"No more arguments, Ash," she said. "Believe me; this is for your own good."

What does she do with him?
1443312.title: - So I can fit you Up my Ass."

14433121.content:
Ash watches as his mother, Delia, continues to hike up her long dark blue skirt to reveal her white lacy panties and she pulls on the back of her panties to prepare to drops him in by her ass. But then, Delia stopped as she has another idea for her shrunken son. She closes the back of her panties and brings Ash back to her face. He was relieved that he didn't go into his mother's ass, but he was confused by her sudden halt from what she was goons do.

"You know what, Ash? You're right. Having you in my ass doesn't really sound like the best idea." Delia said.

Ash was feeling better now when she decided not to put him in her huge ass. But, his time of relief was short-lived as he hears what his mother had anything else in store for him.

"But, I think I might have thought of a better place for you to be in." Delia said.

She moves her hand to the front side of her panties and she pulls on them to have Ash see her vagina from where he is now. Ash felt himself getting paled as he figures out what she's gonna do now.

"Now, get ready to be in your new comfy home, Ash. I promise that you'll love it very much." Delia said with a seducetive smile on her face.

She then let Ash go to have him fall down into her panties. Once there, he rolls down the fabric and soon hits her vagina. Delia felt it as she closes her panties shut and pats on the spot that her son is in.

"There you go, Ash. Nice and safe from any danger that might happen to you. You're gonna enjoy being inside Mommy's panties, Dear. Now, let's go home." Delia said.

Delia fixes her skirt and goes off to head home while caring her tiny son in her panties. Ash was in disbelief by what just happened. His own mother shrunk him and now she has him trapped in her panties and against her vagina with no way out. Ash doesn't know what she'll have him do now, but it's gonna be crazy on so many levels when they get back home.
